details: Unlocked $100M+/year in Azure CapEx and earned org-wide recognition by architecting and productizing an ML-driven CPU oversubscription capability.
Delivered ~$50M+/year in verified CapEx savings by leading technical execution of platform-wide policy changes validated through CapEx reporting.
Shipped ML inference that drives production control-plane behavior across Service Fabric microservices and legacy C# services.
Improved next-generation model quality (+6 pp offline accuracy) and production readiness by developing predictive models on large-scale time-series telemetry.
Delivered an internal RAG chatbot used for onboarding and knowledge discovery by designing the pipeline (LangChain + Semantic Kernel).
Led a small team to ship a production software stack for an autonomous catheter robot (Python backend, GUI, real-time motor control/integration).
Developed an LSTM catheter pose estimator that uses fiber-optic sensor data for real-time inference (sub 20ms/scan).
Enabled data-driven capacity planning for spot VMs at global fleet scale by building Power BI dashboards and using decision-tree analysis.
Enabled scalable edit detection on graph-genome data by building a modular Python CLI pipeline and benchmarking alignments.
